Be ready! Wave is done! Well done! Waving!
WorldWideWaves is an ephemeral mobile app with a visionary goal: to orchestrate a series of human waves that ripple through great cities, across countries, culminating in a final, awe-inspiring wave that spans the globe. Set to unfold over the span of one year, this initiative aims to transcend physical and cultural boundaries, fostering a sense of unity, community, and shared human experience.
At its core, WorldWideWaves is more than just an app—it's a global movement designed to bring people together in a display of solidarity and joy.
By leveraging technology, WorldWideWaves will enable participants from around the world to join in these human waves in their cities, creating a powerful visual and emotional spectacle.
In essence, WorldWideWaves is an ambitious endeavor to harness the power of technology for a truly noble cause—connecting humanity in a celebration of unity, joy and collective action. Through each wave, participants will not only contribute to a global spectacle but also experience the profound impact of coming together as one.
Dr Wave @dr.wave https://www.instagram.com/dr.wave/ @worldwide.waves https://www.instagram.com/worldwide.waves/ #wwwaves
Rules & Security Welcome to WorldWideWaves! We are excited to have you join our global wave events. To ensure everyone has a safe and enjoyable experience, please follow these guidelines: General Rules : Respect for All: Treat all participants with respect, regardless of their background. Please uphold respect for all attendees; discriminatory behavior or harassment is not acceptable at our events. Follow Directions: Adhere to instructions from event organizers and local authorities at all times if any. Stay Within Designated Areas: For your safety, remain within the areas designated for the event if any. No Alcohol or Illegal Substances: We kindly request that attendees refrain from bringing alcohol or illegal substances to the event. Minimize Environmental Impact: Dispose of all waste in designated receptacles and avoid littering to keep our venues clean. Report Concerns: If you see something suspicious or someone in distress, immediately report it to event staff or local authorities. Safety Tips: Dress Appropriately: Wear comfortable clothing and footwear suitable for the event's activities and weather conditions. Stay Hydrated: Bring water and stay hydrated, especially during events in warm climates. Be Mindful of Your Belongings: Keep personal belongings secure and avoid bringing valuables that you do not need. Use the Buddy System: Stay with friends or make new ones, and look out for each other's safety. First Aid: Familiarize yourself with the locations of first aid stations, which are clearly marked on the event map in the app. Emergency Procedures: Evacuation Routes: Know the evacuation routes, marked clearly in our app and at the event site. Emergency Contacts: Save the emergency contact numbers provided in the app, including local emergency services and event-specific contacts. In Case of Emergency: Follow the instructions of event staff and emergency responders. If an evacuation is ordered, leave promptly and calmly. Legal: Liability Waiver: Participation in WorldWideWaves events is at your own risk. By participating, you agree to waive any claims against the organizers related to injuries that could happen during the event. Media Release: Events may be photographed or filmed for promotional purposes. Participation grants us permission to use your image in promotional materials.
